hanzi-su-wiki:
卷

Значения

Свиток, рулон

Мнемоника

Искажено. Свернутый в рулон документ. Вверху — след 采, т.е. номер, по которому его можно найти. Внизу — бирка 巴 — на свиток наложена печать. По иной версии вверху — две руки и злак, т.е. рисовая солома, из которой делали бумагу.

Варианты

捲, 巻
purpleculture_pinyin:
juǎn
to roll up; roll; classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc); to roll (up); to sweep up; to carry on; roll
закатать; рулон; классификатор для мелких вещей в рулоне (пачка бумажных денег, кинолента и т. д.); свернуть (свернуть); подмести; продолжать; рулон

juàn
scroll; book; volume; chapter; examination paper; classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
прокрутка; книга; объем; глава; экзаменационная работа; классификатор для книг, картин: объем, свиток

CONTEXT_sherlock:
卷发curls
说完，他对那个卷发[9]男人说: “谢先生，这是我的朋友赵亮。After finishing speaking, he said to the man with curly hair: "Mr. Xie, this is my friend Zhao Liang.
高明又对卷发男人说。Gao Ming said to the curly-haired man again.
卷发男人慢慢地拿出了一张报纸。The curly-haired man slowly took out a newspaper.
卷volume
赵亮又看了一下那个男人，不高，有点儿胖，最有意思[5]的是，他的头发[6]是卷的。Zhao Liang looked at the man again. He was not tall and a little fat. The most interesting thing [5] was that his hair [6] was curly.
“头发这么卷的男人，我从来没有[7]看到过。"I've never seen a man with such curly hair [7].
说完，他对那个卷发[9]男人说: “谢先生，这是我的朋友赵亮。After finishing speaking, he said to the man with curly hair: "Mr. Xie, this is my friend Zhao Liang.
heisig_chinese_memo: In schools of the future students have to give their fingerprints to make sure they are the student they say they are when they take their exam paper at the end of the quarter.
Ru_trainchinese:
juǎn: (сч.слово) рулон, катушка (туалетной бумаги, фотопленки и т.д.)
juǎn: (глаг/сущ) скатывать, скручивать; сносить, увлекать; касаться; сверток, рулон
juàn: (сч.слово/сущ) том; книга, свиток; (канц.) файл, дело; экзаменационная работа
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: To cheat on your exam you roll up your exam paper with your fingers and throw it like a dart out the window.  Your friend catches it outside, fills it out, and throws it back in to you.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " Jie ", " Shu ". The original meaning is the bendable part of the joints of the upper and lower legs, opposite to "厀" (" knee "). "Shuowen": "Volume, sorrowful song. From Jie, snoring." The extension means bending. Duan Yucai's note: "Extension is the ancestor of all songs." Such as "Poetry. Daya. "Juan A" "Who has scrolls, the wind blows from the south." Mao Chuan: "Juan, Qu Ye." "Zhuangzi. "Xiaoyaoyou": "The big book is swollen but not in the ink, and the twigs are curled and not in accordance with the rules. The painter will ignore it."

" Roll " means to bend the object into a cylindrical shape and then make a " roll ". Such as "Poetry. Bei Feng. "Bai Zhou": "My heart is a bandit, so I cannot be rolled up." It means that my heart is not a bamboo mat and cannot be rolled up. It also means an object rolled into a cylindrical shape. Such as "Huainanzi. "Strategic Strategy": "Therefore, a soldier who has won the Taoism, the car will not start, the riding will not be saddled, the drum will not shake the dust, the flag will not be unrolled, the armour will not leave the arrow, the blade will not taste the blood." Gao Luu's note: "roll, beam."

" Volume " means collection. Such as "The Analects. "Wei Linggong": "A state where there is Tao is official; a state without Tao can be rolled and embraced." "Yi Li. Public Food Doctor’s Ceremony: "There are three sacrifices from the division, which belong to the hotel." Zheng Xuan's note: "The scroll is still collected, and the words are exhaustive."

" Volume " also means inclusion and possession. Such as "Historical Records. "The Book of Emperor Qin Shihuang": "According to the letter of confusion, Qin Xiaogong held the land of Yongzhou, the monarch and his ministers clung to the Zhou Dynasty, swept the world, encompassing the universe, encompassing the meaning of the four seas, and swallowing the heart of eight wastes." "Han Shu. "The Biography of Li Lu Zhu Liu Shu Sun": "Your Majesty rises up abundantly today, accepts 3,000 people, and travels along the way, enrolling in the Shu Han, setting the Three Qin Dynasty, fighting against Xiang Ji in Xingyang, fighting for 70, and fighting for 40."

Ancient books were often written on silk or paper, rolled up for collection, and later referred to as " rolls ." "Said Wen. "Pian, Shu Ye" in "Bamboo Department", Duan Yucai's note: "Ancient Pian, Han people also call a scroll. The scroll can also be scrolled." Such as "Three Kingdoms. Wei Zhi. "Wen Di Ji" Pei Songzhi's Note quoted Cao Pi "Dian Lun. "Self-narrative": "Shangya is a good book of poetry and literature, although I am in the army, I can't release the scroll." Tao Yuanming of the Eastern Jin Dynasty, "Shu Ziyan et al.": "Study on the piano less, I love to be quiet, and if I can open the book, I gladly forget to eat."

The length of articles and books is also based on the number of volumes, so " volume " can also be used as a quantifier to indicate the unit of the volume. Such as "Han Shu. "Yiwenzhi": "Dafanshu, six lieutenant thirty-eight kinds, five hundred and ninety-six families, three thousand two hundred and sixty-nine volumes." Tang Dynasty Du Fu "A gift to Wei Zuozheng 22 rhymes": "Reading breaks ten thousand volumes , Write as if there is a god."

" Volume " also refers to all types of instruments, papers, files and so on. Such as "Song History. Election Record One: "Following examinations, the emperor’s relatives have been reading the papers for many days, and the prime minister has repeatedly asked Yi to go back to Yousi, and then he ordered the officials to know the work. "Gao Chu Chuan": "Each season, the selection of people arrives, and the officials ask to review the old books, which is called the inspection."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " Jie " and " Shun ". The original meaning is the bendable part of the joints of the upper and lower legs, opposite to "厀" (" knee ").
humanum_full_description:
從「卩」，「龹」聲。本義是大小腿相連關節的後邊可彎曲之處，與「厀」（「膝」）相對。《說文》：「卷，厀曲也。从卩，龹聲。」引申表示彎曲。段玉裁注：「引伸為凡曲之偁。」如《詩．大雅．卷阿》「有卷者阿，飄風自南。」毛傳：「卷，曲也。」《莊子．逍遙遊》：「其大本擁腫而不中繩墨，其小枝卷曲而不中規矩，立之塗，匠者不顧。」

　　「卷」表示把物件彎曲成圓筒狀，後作「捲」。如《詩．邶風．柏舟》：「我心匪席，不可卷也。」意謂我的心不是竹席，不能夠捲起來。又表示捲成圓筒狀的物件。如《淮南子．兵略》：「故得道之兵，車不發軔，騎不被鞍，鼓不振塵，旗不解卷，甲不離矢，刃不嘗血。」高誘注：「卷，束也。」

　　「卷」表示收藏。如《論語．衛靈公》：「邦有道則仕；邦無道則可卷而懷之。」《儀禮．公食大夫禮》：「有司卷三牲之俎，歸于賓館。」鄭玄注：「卷猶收也，無遺之辭也。」

　　「卷」又表示囊括、佔有。如《史記．秦始皇本紀》：「秦孝公據殽函之固，擁雍州之地，君臣固守而窺周室，有席卷天下，包舉宇內，囊括四海之意，并吞八荒之心。」《漢書．酈陸朱劉叔孫傳》：「今陛下起豐沛，收卒三千人，以之徑往，卷蜀漢，定三秦，與項籍戰滎陽，大戰七十，小戰四十。」

　　古代的書往往寫在簡帛或紙上，捲起來收藏，後把書籍稱為「卷」。《說文．竹部》「篇，書也」，段玉裁注：「古曰篇，漢人亦曰卷。卷者，縑帛可捲也。」如《三國志．魏志．文帝紀》裴松之注引曹丕《典論．自敘》：「上雅好詩書文籍，雖在軍旅，手不釋卷。」東晉陶淵明〈與子儼等疏〉：「少學琴書，偶愛閑靜，開卷有得，便欣然忘食。」

　　文章、書籍的篇幅也是以卷的數量論，故「卷」亦可作量詞，表示書冊的單位。如《漢書．藝文志》：「大凡書，六略三十八種，五百九十六家，萬三千二百六十九卷。」唐代杜甫〈奉贈韋左丞丈二十二韻〉：「讀書破萬卷，下筆如有神。」

　　「卷」還泛指各類文書、試卷、檔案等。如《宋史．選舉志一》：「凡廷試，帝親閱卷累日，宰相屢請宜歸有司，始詔歲命官知舉。」《金史．高衎傳》：「每季選人至，吏部託以檢閱舊籍，謂之檢卷。」
humanum_short_description: 從「卩」，「龹」聲。本義是大小腿相連關節的後邊可彎曲之處，與「厀」（「膝」）相對。

книга тяжёлая падает, глагол опуститься подняться
Chinese: In schools of the future students have to give their fingerprints to make sure they are the student they say they are when they take their exam paper at the end of the quarter.
Meaning: roll up
Hanzi: 捲
Story: To cheat on your exam you roll up your exam paper with your fingers and throw it like a dart out the window. Your friend catches it outside, fills it out, and throws it back in to you.
Kind: simplified

從「 卩 」，「 龹 」聲。本義是大小腿相連關節的後邊可彎曲之處，與「 厀 」（「 膝 」）相對。《說文》：「卷，厀曲也。从卩，龹聲。」引申表示彎曲。段玉裁注：「引伸為凡曲之偁。」如《詩．大雅．卷阿》「有卷者阿，飄風自南。」毛傳：「卷，曲也。」《莊子．逍遙遊》：「其大本擁腫而不中繩墨，其小枝卷曲而不中規矩，立之塗，匠者不顧。」 「 卷 」表示把物件彎曲成圓筒狀，後作「 捲 」。如《詩．邶風．柏舟》：「我心匪席，不可卷也。」意謂我的心不是竹席，不能夠捲起來。又表示捲成圓筒狀的物件。如《淮南子．兵略》：「故得道之兵，車不發軔，騎不被鞍，鼓不振塵，旗不解卷，甲不離矢，刃不嘗血。」高誘注：「卷，束也。」 「 卷 」表示收藏。如《論語．衛靈公》：「邦有道則仕；邦無道則可卷而懷之。」《儀禮．公食大夫禮》：「有司卷三牲之俎，歸于賓館。」鄭玄注：「卷猶收也，無遺之辭也。」 「 卷 」又表示囊括、佔有。如《史記．秦始皇本紀》：「秦孝公據殽函之固，擁雍州之地，君臣固守而窺周室，有席卷天下，包舉宇內，囊括四海之意，并吞八荒之心。」《漢書．酈陸朱劉叔孫傳》：「今陛下起豐沛，收卒三千人，以之徑往，卷蜀漢，定三秦，與項籍戰滎陽，大戰七十，小戰四十。」 古代的書往往寫在簡帛或紙上，捲起來收藏，後把書籍稱為「 卷 」。《說文．竹部》「篇，書也」，段玉裁注：「古曰篇，漢人亦曰卷。卷者，縑帛可捲也。」如《三國志．魏志．文帝紀》裴松之注引曹丕《典論．自敘》：「上雅好詩書文籍，雖在軍旅，手不釋卷。」東晉陶淵明〈與子儼等疏〉：「少學琴書，偶愛閑靜，開卷有得，便欣然忘食。」 文章、書籍的篇幅也是以卷的數量論，故「 卷 」亦可作量詞，表示書冊的單位。如《漢書．藝文志》：「大凡書，六略三十八種，五百九十六家，萬三千二百六十九卷。」唐代杜甫〈奉贈韋左丞丈二十二韻〉：「讀書破萬卷，下筆如有神。」 「 卷 」還泛指各類文書、試卷、檔案等。如《宋史．選舉志一》：「凡廷試，帝親閱卷累日，宰相屢請宜歸有司，始詔歲命官知舉。」《金史．高衎傳》：「每季選人至，吏部託以檢閱舊籍，謂之檢卷。」
From the sound of " Jie", " Shu". The original meaning is the bendable part of the joints of the upper and lower legs, opposite to " 厀" (" knee"). "Shuowen": "Volume, sorrowful song. From Jie, snoring." The extension means bending. Duan Yucai's note: "Extension is the ancestor of all songs." Such as "Poetry. Daya. "Juan A" "Who has scrolls, the wind blows from the south." Mao Chuan: "Juan, Qu Ye." "Zhuangzi. "Xiaoyaoyou": "The big book is swollen but not in the ink, and the twigs are curled and not in accordance with the rules. The painter will ignore it." " Roll" means to bend the object into a cylindrical shape and then make a " roll". Such as "Poetry. Bei Feng. "Bai Zhou": "My heart is a bandit, so I cannot be rolled up." It means that my heart is not a bamboo mat and cannot be rolled up. It also means an object rolled into a cylindrical shape. Such as "Huainanzi. "Strategic Strategy": "Therefore, a soldier who has won the Taoism, the car will not start, the riding will not be saddled, the drum will not shake the dust, the flag will not be unrolled, the armour will not leave the arrow, the blade will not taste the blood." Gao Luu's note: "roll, beam." " Volume" means collection. Such as "The Analects. "Wei Linggong": "A state where there is Tao is official; a state without Tao can be rolled and embraced." "Yi Li. Public Food Doctor’s Ceremony: "There are three sacrifices from the division, which belong to the hotel." Zheng Xuan's note: "The scroll is still collected, and the words are exhaustive." " Volume" also means inclusion and possession. Such as "Historical Records. "The Book of Emperor Qin Shihuang": "According to the letter of confusion, Qin Xiaogong held the land of Yongzhou, the monarch and his ministers clung to the Zhou Dynasty, swept the world, encompassing the universe, encompassing the meaning of the four seas, and swallowing the heart of eight wastes." "Han Shu. "The Biography of Li Lu Zhu Liu Shu Sun": "Your Majesty rises up abundantly today, accepts 3,000 people, and travels along the way, enrolling in the Shu Han, setting the Three Qin Dynasty, fighting against Xiang Ji in Xingyang, fighting for 70, and fighting for 40." Ancient books were often written on silk or paper, rolled up for collection, and later referred to as " rolls." "Said Wen. "Pian, Shu Ye" in "Bamboo Department", Duan Yucai's note: "Ancient Pian, Han people also call a scroll. The scroll can also be scrolled." Such as "Three Kingdoms. Wei Zhi. "Wen Di Ji" Pei Songzhi's Note quoted Cao Pi "Dian Lun. "Self-narrative": "Shangya is a good book of poetry and literature, although I am in the army, I can't release the scroll." Tao Yuanming of the Eastern Jin Dynasty, "Shu Ziyan et al.": "Study on the piano less, I love to be quiet, and if I can open the book, I gladly forget to eat." The length of articles and books is also based on the number of volumes, so " volume" can also be used as a quantifier to indicate the unit of the volume. Such as "Han Shu. "Yiwenzhi": "Dafanshu, six lieutenant thirty-eight kinds, five hundred and ninety-six families, three thousand two hundred and sixty-nine volumes." Tang Dynasty Du Fu "A gift to Wei Zuozheng 22 rhymes": "Reading breaks ten thousand volumes , Write as if there is a god." " Volume" also refers to all types of instruments, papers, files and so on. Such as "Song History. Election Record One: "Following examinations, the emperor’s relatives have been reading the papers for many days, and the prime minister has repeatedly asked Yi to go back to Yousi, and then he ordered the officials to know the work. "Gao Chu Chuan": "Each season, the selection of people arrives, and the officials ask to review the old books, which is called the inspection."

卷字的基本解释

卷
juàn
可以舒展和弯转成圆筒形的书画：长卷。画卷。手卷。
书籍的册本或篇章：上卷。第一卷。藏书十万卷。卷帙（书卷成束，用布裹或布囊装起来称“帙”，即书套。现一般指书籍）。
考试用的纸：试卷。
机关里分类汇存的档案、文件：案卷。
舒

卷
（捲）
juǎn
把东西弯转裹成圆筒形：卷尺。卷帘子。
裹挟带动：卷入。卷扬。
弯转裹成筒形的东西：烟卷儿。纸卷儿。
舒

卷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［juǎn］
［《廣韻》居轉切，上獮，見。］
亦作“巻1”。
(1)把物弯转成圆筒形。
(2)卷成圆筒状的东西。
(3)席卷。
(4)掀起。
(5)收；收起。
(6)犹言裹挟；裹住。
(7)犹聚。
(8)断绝。
(9)方言。骂。
(10)量词。用于成卷的物件。
(11)“捲”的简化字。
[②]［juàn］
［《廣韻》居倦切，去線，見。］
(1)书籍或字画的卷轴。
(2)泛指书籍；书本。
(3)指自己所写的文稿。
(4)全书的一部分。
(5)用作量词，指书籍的册，本。
(6)考卷；试卷。
(7)案卷；档案。参见“卷2宗”。
(8)通“券”。券契，契约。
(9)通“倦”。
[③]［quán］
［《廣韻》巨員切，平僊，羣。］
(1)弯曲。
(2)柔弱。参见“卷3然”。
(3)通“婘”。美好貌。
(4)通“拳”。拳头。参见“卷3石”。
(5)通“拳”。忠恳貌。参见“卷3卷”。
[④]［quān］

卷字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【卩字部】　卷； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页159第23
【唐韻】居倦切【集韻】【韻會】古倦切【正韻】吉掾切，?音眷。【說文】厀曲也。又書卷。【揚子·法言】一卷之書，必立之師。【增韻】可舒卷者曰卷。編次者曰帙。又【唐韻】居轉切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】古轉切，?眷上聲。【廣韻】舒卷之卷。【韻會】或作捲。又卷耳，艸名。【詩·周南】采采卷耳。又卷舌，星名。【前漢·劉向傳】客星見昴卷之閒。【註】師古曰：見於昴與卷舌之閒也。又【唐韻】巨員切【集韻】【韻會】逵員切，?音權。【集韻】曲也。【詩·大雅】有卷者阿。又【中庸】一卷，石之多。【註】猶區也。又【韻會】大卷，黃帝樂名。【周禮·大司樂註】卷者，卷聚之義。又通作惓。【前漢·賈捐之傳】敢昧死竭卷卷。又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?驅圓切，音㒽。【集韻】縣名，在河南。【前漢·周勃傳】周勃，沛人，其先卷人也。又【集韻】一曰冠武。又【正韻】古本切，音袞。【禮·王制】三公一命卷，天子卷冕。

：本义指膝曲。也有弯曲意思，还有书籍等含义。

Exam paper: test paper.
Archives and documents classified and stored in the agency: case files.
